cont.entity_a: Incredible sound quality, better than Bose earphones. Sound is slightly warmer than SR80i's. Excellent sound quality, clear and accurate. High-quality audio product. Top quality sound. Sound quality is good but not the best in its price range. Smooth, detailed sound. Crisp and clear sound on various music genres. Superb sound quality, used for mixing and mastering. Excellent clarity and frequency response. Vocals are rich and natural with no distortion. Well worth the price for sound quality. Sound quality is excellent. Sound quality is just amazing. Bass is thin and weak, soundstage distant, highs are ok.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is pretty good. Fair sound quality, better than V-Moda. Crisp music with solid bass. Sound is clear after break-in period. Sound quality is fantastic. Sound is tinny and thin with very little bass.

cont.entity_a: Comfort issues after an hour, especially for glasses wearers. Painful after 20-30 minutes for users with ears that stick out. Comfort is tolerable for 2+ hours. Bowl-shaped pads hurt ears after 30 minutes. Comfort is adequate, but foam ear-cups become form-fitting. Lightweight and comfortable for several hours.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable with soft ear pieces. Comfortable for hours. Hurt ears after prolonged use.

cont.entity_a: Distinct retro style. Semi-open design not ideal for noisy environments. Semi-open design with great sound depth.
cont.entity_b: Ear buds are very small, requiring delicacy to put on. Fit snugly to eliminate ambient noise. Better fit than Bose earbuds.

cont.entity_a: Noise isolation is non-existent. Semi-open design not ideal for noisy environments.
cont.entity_b: Noise-cancelling attributes are good. Blocks ambient noise well. Fit snugly to eliminate ambient noise. Blocks outside noise well.

cont.entity_a: Foam earpieces disintegrated over time. Earpiece can fall off the mounting stalk.
cont.entity_b: Connection of the wire at the plug exposed in less than a year. Wires become crooked over time. Fragile with thin cables that pass on external noise. Cannot return if broken.

cont.entity_a: The cable is too thick and heavy. Requires an adapter for 1/8" plug. Not suitable for laptops without an adapter.

cont.entity_b: Bass not as good as Sennheisers. Crisp music with solid bass. Sound is tinny and thin with very little bass.

cont.entity_a: Well worth the price for sound quality.

cont.entity_b: Frequency response has a bump in the mid treble range.

cont.entity_a: Great for rock or folk music. Excellent for jazz, classical, rock, reggae, and opera.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for running due to foot pounding noise.
